targets.expr: sum(rate(node_cpu{alias="$host"}[$interval])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", alias="$host"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{alias="$host"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", alias="$host"})

seriesOverrides.alias: Processes blocked waiting for I/O to complete

targets.legendFormat: Processes blocked waiting for I/O to complete
